<h1 align="center">ScpProximityChat</h1>
<h6 align="center">Also known as ScpChatExtensions, works for both Exiled and NWAPI</h6>

<h2>How to use?</h1>
<h4>To switch between chats you gotta use the left ALT key, the NOCLIP one.</h4>
